markdown: '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [task](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsSeekerSlayerSurvivor/) in {{lax1}}. ## Synopsis The Surviving Face wishes me to travel to Neketaka in search of someone or something which persists without surviving. I can return what I find for favor with the boar. ## Walkthrough * You find [The Matron's Skull](/theMatronsSkull/) in the northern part of [The Hanging Sepulchers](/theHangingSepulchers/), in the [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/) district of [Neketaka](/neketaka/). *After picking up the skull a wave of skeletons around you will rise from the dead to kill your party. They are easy to beat so after them another wave of skeletons will try as well, tougher this time. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/LAX01_00_Arena_Island/LAX01_00_tsk_artifact_survivor_skull.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''The Surviving Face's Hunt for the Matron's Skull''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | The Surviving Face wishes me to travel to Neketaka in search of someone or something which persists without surviving. I can return what I find for favor with the boar. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Acquire the Matron's Skull.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Engari discovered that the item I seek can be found among the altars of the dead in Neketaka. That likely means the city's sepulchers. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Return the Matron's Skull to the Pool of Memories.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | I located the Matron's Skull - though not without some unexpected difficulty - in the Hanging Sepulchers. I must return it to the Pool of Memories if I want to take advantage of its spiritual history. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I added the Matron's Skull to the Pool of Memories, unlocking additional challenges in the Crucible. |}
raw: {{Infobox quest poe2 | name = The Surviving Face's Hunt for the Matron's Skull | image = LAX01 artifact skull icon.png | caption = | added_in = lax1 | quest_type = Task | quest_region = | quest_level = 16 | faction = | locations = Temple of Toamowhai;The Hanging Sepulchers | main_npcs = | quest_giver = The Surviving Face | xp_amount = 200 | xp_type = Minor | xp_level = 16 | xp_weights = 1;1 | rewardname1 = Return it to the Pool | reward1 = Unlocks the Skeleton Crew Endurance Trial at the [[Pool_of_Memories|Pool of Memories]] | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = | conc = | next = | internalname = LAX01_00_tsk_artifact_survivor_skull | guid = 79c72eaf-8817-4214-bd5a-1e41d30f7edc }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire quests#Seeker, Slayer, Survivor|task]] in {{lax1}}. ==Synopsis== The Surviving Face wishes me to travel to Neketaka in search of someone or something which persists without surviving. I can return what I find for favor with the boar. ==Walkthrough== * You find [[The Matron's Skull]] in the northern part of [[The Hanging Sepulchers]], in the [[The Sacred Stair]] district of [[Neketaka]]. *After picking up the skull a wave of skeletons around you will rise from the dead to kill your party. They are easy to beat so after them another wave of skeletons will try as well, tougher this time. ==Journal== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/LAX01_00_Arena_Island/LAX01_00_tsk_artifact_survivor_skull.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''The Surviving Face's Hunt for the Matron's Skull''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | The Surviving Face wishes me to travel to Neketaka in search of someone or something which persists without surviving. I can return what I find for favor with the boar. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Acquire the Matron's Skull.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Engari discovered that the item I seek can be found among the altars of the dead in Neketaka. That likely means the city's sepulchers. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Return the Matron's Skull to the Pool of Memories.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | I located the Matron's Skull - though not without some unexpected difficulty - in the Hanging Sepulchers. I must return it to the Pool of Memories if I want to take advantage of its spiritual history. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I added the Matron's Skull to the Pool of Memories, unlocking additional challenges in the Crucible. |}
title: The Surviving Face's Hunt for the Matron's Skull
